alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Marion (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 4:56PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Marion and central Baxter Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 456 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gassville, or near Bull Shoals, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mountain Home... Bull Shoals... Gassville... Flippin... Lakeview in Baxter County... Norfork... Salesville... Briarcliff... Arkawana... Ozark Regional Airport... Fawn Park... Bull Shoals State Park... Shipp... Herron... Colfax... Cartney... Norfork Dam... Cotter... Midway in Baxter County... Fairview in Marion County... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
